# Token Reference Table

This table lists all tokens for this component:

| Token | Description |
|-------|------------|
| height | Controls the overall height of the top navigation bar (the horizontal header at the top of the page). Acceptable units: px, em, rem, vh.<br>CSS variable: --wm-top-height |
| background | Sets the background color of the top navigation bar (the horizontal header at the top of the page).<br>CSS variable: --wm-top-background |
| box.shadow | Controls the drop shadow of the top navigation bar to create depth and separation from page content. Use subtle shadows for a refined look.<br>CSS variable: --wm-top-box-shadow |
| z.index | Controls the stacking order (z-index) of the top navigation bar relative to other elements. Higher values keep the bar above overlapping content.<br>CSS variable: --wm-top-z-index |
| border.color | Sets the border color of the top navigation bar. Commonly used for a bottom divider line.<br>CSS variable: --wm-top-border-color |
| border.style | Controls the border style of the top navigation bar. Allowed values: solid, dashed, dotted, none.<br>CSS variable: --wm-top-border-style |
| border.radius | Controls corner rounding of the top navigation bar. Use higher values for rounded corners.<br>CSS variable: --wm-top-border-radius |
| border.width | Controls the border thickness of the top navigation bar in the order: top right bottom left. The default adds only a bottom divider line.<br>CSS variable: --wm-top-border-width |
